F2P is nice and fun but u will found 90% of players r hackers 8% of players are brainless rush boi, 2% good players.
BUT u can pay double the amount (from 30ish to 60ish) than before to obtain the prime access which WAS a good tool to stop hackers and trolls since it was an effective tool to filter out serious player but now it's just a joke that u can obtain it without spending significant amount of time invest by paying 60ish MYR (yes im a malaysian), and EVEN WITH THE PRIME STATUS YOU WILL STILL FIND 80% OF THE PLAYERS ARE HACKERS BECAUSE THE REQUIREMENT FOR PRIME STATUS IS SUCH EASY NOW

Basically all this f2p plan is a way valve can leech more money from the players while giving no fuck to the community what so ever. This gigantic piece of garbage should be rename into CSGO : Vac is a joke .

Also since I dont give a flying mother russia in ur arse, imma say it, CSGO SPRAY PATTERN IS NO SKILL LUCK ORIENTED PIECE OF GARBAGE TECHNIQUE TO SATISFIED SOME LUCKY PIECE OF LOSER . yaa there are a tiny skill cap there but luck takes a HUGE PLACE in the play.
